items.name: case portrait
items.desc: Indicates that video should be oriented vertically, top at the top.

items.name: case portraitUpsideDown
items.desc: Indicates that video should be oriented vertically, top at the bottom.

items.name: case landscapeRight
items.desc: Indicates that video should be oriented horizontally, top on the left.

items.name: case landscapeLeft
items.desc: Indicates that video should be oriented horizontally, top on the right.
